content:
For next week's 00 WG Conference Call:
Thursday Apr 2, 2020 - 01:00 PM (Eastern Time, GMT -05)
CALL DETAILS

Eric Haas: let me know if you would like to pull an item out to discuss. You will get another opportunity on the call to remove an item.

No. Issue key Summary (Reporter) Resolution

  1. J#25730 Observation: Reference range units (echesley) Considered - Question answered
  2. J#22643 ObservationDefinition conformant to the Definition pattern (fmacary) Persuasive
  3. J#20492 Update and fix ObservationDefinition example (rhausam) Persuasive
  4. J#18995 Use proper datatype for the value sets of ObservationDefinition (fmacary) Persuasive
